name: Shield
description: Blocks any number of missile, monster, or stab attacks on the turn it is cast.
usage: Casts instantly; lasts one round.
notes: Equivalent to ward "shield" in the bot.

name: Remove Enchantment
description: Removes every enchantment affecting the subject (including those resolving this turn) and destroys targeted monsters.
usage: Does not undo past effects like turns already lost to blindness.

name: Magic Mirror
description: Reflects any spell cast at the subject back to the caster for that turn.
usage: Does not reflect self-targeted spells or area effects.
notes: Cancelled if Counter-spell or Dispel Magic also lands.

name: Counter Spell
description: Cancels every hostile spell on the subject that turn (except Dispel Magic and Finger of Death) and counts as a shield.
usage: Protects only the chosen subject from blanket spells.
notes: Bot models this via temporary "counter-spell" ward.

name: Dispel Magic
description: Universal counter: nullifies every spell in the turn (except another Dispel), removes all enchantments, destroys all monsters, and shields the caster.
usage: Cannot stop stabs or surrenders.
notes: Acts globally rather than per subject.

name: Raise Dead
description: Restores a freshly dead wizard/monster to full health and clears every enchantment and ailment.
usage: Subject may act immediately after being raised.
notes: Not blocked by Counter-spell but canceled by Dispel Magic.

name: Cure Light Wounds
description: Heals 1 point and reduces simultaneous Cause Light Wounds damage to 1.
usage: No effect if the subject is undamaged.

name: Cure Heavy Wounds
description: Heals up to 2 points, removes disease, and halves simultaneous Cause Heavy Wounds damage.
usage: No effect on a fully healthy subject.

name: Summon Goblin
description: Creates a goblin that deals/takes 1 damage per attack.
usage: Targeted monster can act immediately.

name: Summon Ogre
description: Creates an ogre (2 damage each turn, 2 HP).
usage: Monster attacks or waits per controller orders.

name: Summon Troll
description: Creates a troll that deals 3 damage per attack and has 3 HP.
usage: Functions like other summoned monsters.

name: Summon Giant
description: Creates a giant (4 damage, 4 HP).
usage: Targets like other summons.

name: Elemental
description: Summons fire or ice elemental; hits everyone lacking proper resistance for 3 damage each turn until destroyed.
usage: Caster chooses type after seeing the turn’s gestures.
notes: Cancel rules depend on element type.

name: Missile
description: Deals 1 damage unless blocked by Shield, Counter-spell, Magic Mirror, or Dispel Magic.
usage: Quick poke to finish an opponent.

name: Finger of Death
description: Instant kill that ignores Counter-spell; only Dispel Magic on the final gesture prevents it.
usage: Requires long buildup; disrupt with Anti-spell.

name: Lightning Bolt
description: Deals 5 unblockable damage (short sequence usable once per duel).
usage: Heat/cold resistance irrelevant.

name: Cause Light Wounds
description: Inflicts 2 damage; simultaneous Cure Light Wounds reduces to 1.
usage: Quick offensive spell.

name: Cause Heavy Wounds
description: Inflicts 3 damage; simultaneous Cure Heavy Wounds reduces to 1.
usage: Longer variant of Cause Light Wounds.

name: Fireball
description: Deals 5 fire damage unless the subject has heat resistance; cancels with Ice Storm on the same victim.
usage: Destroys ice elementals on contact.

name: Fire Storm
description: Deals 5 heat damage to everyone lacking resist heat.
usage: Cancels entirely with an Ice Storm or an ice elemental.

name: Ice Storm
description: Deals 5 cold damage to everyone without resist cold.
usage: Cancels with Fire Storm or a fire elemental; cancels locally with Fireball.

name: Amnesia
description: Subject must repeat this turn’s gestures on the next turn.
usage: Breaks long sequences; monsters repeat previous targets.

name: Confusion
description: For wizards, randomizes one hand’s next gesture; monsters attack random targets.
usage: Fails if subject simultaneously has amnesia/charm/fear/paralysis.

name: Charm Person
description: Caster chooses one gesture for the target’s named hand next turn.
usage: Can force stabs or interrupt spells.

name: Charm Monster
description: Transfers control of a non-elemental monster immediately.
usage: Fails under conflicting enchantments.

name: Paralysis
description: Freezes a chosen hand (or monster) into its current position for the next turn.
usage: Converts C/S/W gestures into F/D/P when immobilized.

name: Fear
description: Subject may not gesture C, D, F, or S next turn.
usage: No effect on monsters.

name: Anti-Spell
description: Subject must restart all spell sequences after the current turn.
usage: Does not affect spells already resolving.

name: Protection from Evil
description: Provides shield-level protection for this and the next three turns.
usage: Hands remain free while the effect lasts.

name: Resist Heat
description: Grants total heat immunity until dispelled.
usage: Destroys fire elementals if they are the subject.

name: Resist Cold
description: Grants total cold immunity until dispelled.
usage: Destroys ice elementals if targeted.

name: Disease
description: Subject dies 6 turns later unless Remove Enchantment, Cure Heavy Wounds, or Dispel Magic is applied.
usage: Non-contagious.

name: Poison
description: As Disease, but Cure Heavy Wounds no longer helps.
usage: Only Remove Enchantment or Dispel Magic cures it.

name: Blindness
description: Target cannot read gestures for three turns; blinded monsters die immediately.
usage: Caster must still announce spells affecting them.

name: Invisibility
description: Subject becomes invisible; opponents see spells but not gestures, and their monsters cannot attack the subject.
usage: Invisible monsters disintegrate.

name: Haste
description: Subject makes two gesture pairs per turn for three turns.
usage: Extra gestures resolve simultaneously, so single counter-spell can stop both if timed.
notes: Monsters controlled by a hasted wizard do not gain extra actions.

name: Time Stop
description: Subject takes an immediate secret extra turn; others cannot react and lose all resistances for that turn.
usage: Monsters/elementals under time stop act instantly as directed.

name: Delayed Effect
description: Next spell the subject completes within three turns is stored (‘banked’) and may be triggered later.
usage: Only spells cast by the subject qualify; one stored spell at a time.

name: Permanency
description: Next eligible enchantment completed by the subject within three turns becomes permanent.
usage: Cannot target Anti-spell, Disease, Poison, or Time Stop.

name: Stab
description: Non-spell attack for 1 damage; blocked by shield-class defenses.
usage: Only one stab per turn because wizards carry one dagger.

name: Surrender
description: Wizard concedes immediately; duel ends unless simultaneous lethal spells resolve.
usage: Draw if multiple wizards surrender simultaneously.
